participant_1.background:
I recall spending long hours in the woods with my dog, chasing rabbits and playing hide-and-seek.
i am hoping to move to australia soon to marry my boyfriend.
i am a graduate student.
i am a humble baker.
I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.

participant_2.background:
I love my fiance and I can't wait to start our life together.
I had to move across country for my job.
i enjoy swimming.
i watch a movie sundays evenings.
I've never been afraid to try new things, but my first time competing in a beauty pageant was definitely the most difficult thing I've ever done.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to swim! I'm a competitive swimmer, and I also like to go swimming for fun. What about you?
I love to bake! I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it. I also like to spend time in the woods with my dog.
That sounds fun! I've never been much of a baker, but I love to eat baked goods. And I love animals! I have a cat and a dog.
What kind of cat do you have? I have a golden retriever.
I have a black cat named Spooky! And I love golden retrievers. They're so cute.
Spooky is a great name for a cat! I've never met a black cat before.
You're missing out! Black cats are the best.
I think I'll have to get one someday!
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm going to swim in a competition on Saturday. And then I'm going to watch a movie with my fiance on Sunday.
That sounds like a fun weekend! I'm going to bake some cookies on Saturday, and then I'm going to spend time in the woods with my dog.
That sounds like a great way to spend the weekend! I love cookies.
I'm glad we're both having a good weekend
